title: "USA", Cover for Catalogue for XXXII International Biennial Exposition of Art, Venice
provenance: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Vertical initials "USa", repeating and alternating in red and blue, to form a diagonal band across a white background. In small black text, upper left corner:"XXXII International Biennial Exhibition of Art   Venice  1964"; in lower right corner: "XXXII Espozitione Biennale Internazionale d'Arte   Veniezia   1964"; vertically in "U" on left: "United States of America"; in "U" on right:"Stati Uniti d'America"
name: Book cover
